item.title: Trump slams departing Canadian Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland as impediment to dealmaking
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump says Canada's departing finance minister was an obstacle to U.S.-Canada relations and "will not be missed."

item.title: Jill Biden says she has closed the book on teaching at Northern Virginia Community College
item.description: Jill Biden has closed the book on her teaching career at a Virginia community college.

item.title: Americans' trust in nation's court system hits record low, survey finds
